attributes.title: Rob
attributes.season: ''Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series''

sections.History:
===Background===
Red Rob was a farmer. [[Rodrik Forrester]] and his friends [[Namond]] and [[Meghan]] would play on his farm when they were children.

==="[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"===
Rodrik travels to Red Rob's abandoned farm to meet in secret with [[Gwyn Whitehill]] and reminisces on playing there as a child. He wonders what happened to Red Rob.<ref>"[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"</ref>
